definitions.definition: Consisting of some indefinite portion resembling a half; approximately a half, whether more or less; partial; imperfect.
Having one parent (rather than two) in common .
examples: A half brother or half sister

definitions.definition: Related through one common grandparent or ancestor rather than two.
examples: A half uncle or half aunt or half cousin
labels: of a relative other than a sibling
definitions.label_groups: of a relative other than a sibling

secondary_definitions: Consisting of some indefinite portion resembling a half; approximately a half, whether more or less; partial; imperfect.
( of a sibling ) Having one parent (rather than two) in common .
( of a relative other than a sibling ) Related through one common grandparent or ancestor rather than two.
